bot.name: Grace
bot.description: Grace is the official Code Society Discord bot.
bot.welcome_message:
Hi {member_name}! Welcome to the **Code Society**.

Before posting please:
    - Take a moment to read the <#{info_id}> and the <#{rules_id}>.
    - Choose some <#{roles_id}>.
    - Feel free to introduce yourself in <#{intro_id}>.
